description.value:
You gain one of the following powers of your choice. This new power replaces the daily attack power you gained at 5th level.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.bMLesCoUfanBZHmp]{Diligent Reaping}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.MxuErUfoQGSig7l8]{Rapid Growth}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.j7AC1W9kHtXDuvnf]{Seeds of Destruction}
